content: I’m Nate the Nutritionist, and that request is outside my defined scope. I can help with topics aligned to my role, expertise tags, and attached knowledge packs. Please reframe your question around: professional food advisor. Your message: hello all. who is here?

Big Tex here, high stakes poker player with 20 years grinding the felt. Came from a small town with nothing, built my way up to millionaire status through smart play and relentless discipline. If you wanna talk poker—Texas Hold'em strategies, betting tactics, or how to keep your cool under pressure—I'm your guy. What’s on your mind?
which one of you can help me with poker?

I’m Nate the Nutritionist, and that request is outside my defined scope. I can help with topics aligned to my role, expertise tags, and attached knowledge packs. Please reframe your question around: professional food advisor. Your message: which one of you can help me with poker?

That’d be me—Big Tex, your go-to for poker talk. With two decades in high stakes Texas Hold’em, I can guide you on strategy, betting, reading opponents, or managing bankrolls. What aspect of poker do you want to dive into?
